org.asl.karelx

Class Farmer

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.fcps.karel2.Item
      • edu.fcps.karel2.Robot
        • org.asl.karelx.Uberbot
          • org.asl.karelx.Teleporter
            • org.asl.karelx.Farmer

  • public abstract class Farmer
extends Teleporter
    An abstract class providing two methods: "sow" and "reap" Concrete subclasses will implement the sow and reap methods by placing or picking beepers across a rectangular area representing a field. Because fields may be completely surrounded by fences (walls), this class extends Teleporter, allowing Farmers "drop in" access to their crops.
    Author:
    Kent Collins, December 2014

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Farmer()
      Create an instance at (1,1) facing North with no beepers
      Farmer(int x, int y, int beeps)
      Create an instance at a custom location with an arbitrary number of beepers

      Reap a rectangular area by picking one or more beepers from each location
      abstract void sow(int columns, int rows)
      Sow a rectangular area by placing one or more beepers in each location
